article_title: Washington Journal Grover Norquist Tax Code
article_text:
February 25, 2014

Grover Norquist on Tax Code Reform Grover Norquist about talked the effort by House Ways and Means Committee Chair Dave Camp (R-MI) to overhaul the tax code. Other… read more

Grover Norquist on Tax Code Reform Grover Norquist about talked the effort by House Ways and Means Committee Chair Dave Camp (R-MI) to overhaul the tax code. Other topics included the U.S. business tax rate versus that of European countries, and congressional partisanship.

C-SPAN Radio’s Nancy Calo read news headlines at the conclusion of the program. close

og.description: Grover Norquist, the president of Americans for Tax Reform, discusses an effort by Ways and Means Committee Chairman Rep. Dave Camp (R-MI) to overhaul the tax code.
